properties.Observatio: The anicut wall is leaking and the canal has broken in places.Water from this canal is used to grow paddy on an area of about 5 acres.

properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal,  some places Constructed of rectangular concrete lining   Water from this canal is used to grow paddy on an area of about 4.5acres.

Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100 mm thick , 300 mm  wide  and 300 mm high canal -double banking

Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2.0 m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m

Vegetative cove
